name: Pizza Time Horror
description:
Chuck E. Cheese’s: Pizza Time Horror is a custom-night based game, based off of Chuck E. Cheese's Pizza Time Theatre. You can take challenges, receive rewards from doing said challenges, like plushies! Visit Pasqually's Shop in the main menu after getting some Chuck-E-Cheese Tokens while playing the game!

Are you ready to take on The Big C & his Pizza Time Playing Pals?


Drawings, Designs, Backgrounds, Voices by SPVGames

Coding & Additional Sketches by FazieFunbear
Voice of Chuck-E-Plush by MerrilltheClown
Audio/Soundtrack by MartinArthur
Additional Music provided by https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCDMYhg8KJjDXDWbK03H_6oQ
Sound Effects by https://freesound.org/

All rights go to CEC Entertainment, Showbiz Inc, & Atari for making all these wonderfully memorable characters!
